title: ARAMS Filthy with bots.. Again..
body:
As many a time before I'm posting this gripe while I wait out my 14 minute penalty for dodging a game because I don't want to waste my fucking time playing a game with a bot on the team.

If I can pick them in champ select how the fuck do you have so much trouble banning them? Even worse, because it's early-ish, I'll wait out my penalty, queue up again and boom. Another fucking bot.

I am legit playing less lately because of the bot plague. Do something Riot ffs before I just stop logging in altogether.

replies.body:
bots? bots are a rumour made up by trolls. 
Riot says there are no bots in aram, low level coop vs ai, or twisted treeline.

Stop propagating rumours, that ryze who's rushed 6 mobi boots and ran down mid, 24hours a day non-stop for the last 4 weeks is just a very sleep deprived and slightly overeager new player. 

Stop picking on new players, movespeed is good, and 6 mobi boots help them get into battle, start pushing faster and helping their team faster. It's an easy mistake for a beginner to make that 6 mobi boots is the best build because it helps them get back to lane when they die faster.

Stop being toxic and start trying to be nice to these new and slightly inept players and offer helpful advice rather than try to get them banned claiming they're a bot, when that would be impossible, because there can't possibly be any bots in league.

Riot doesn't care. They ban people for nothing. They let bots run ram pit without taking them out. EVEN THOU YOU CAN SEE THEY ARE A BOT.
They move the same place over and over. But yet Riot allows them to continue.

Yep, its still happening (game just happened a few minutes ago). 4 bots vs 2 bots. My opponents were probably bronzers or silvers though, they still couldn't win.

[See here.](https://imgur.com/a/RbHfk)

Honestly I've come to believe that there is a reason why riot specifically don't do anything about the bots.  I'm not certain what that reason is, maybe understaffed to deal with the issue, or maybe it increases their server population and makes the end of year figures look better.  
Whatever the reason is, I have to believe its a active choice by riot to ignore this issue.
I've posted several times over the years with simple suggestions, methods of finding and recognising bots without the need of in game observers or reports, given data on when the bots are most active.  (Seriously, op.gg a bot and check out how many aram games are played at 4am in the morning, its crazy)

On a side note, the AI on this latest batch of bots is a lot better.  
Who knows, maybe riot are hoping to hire these bot makers and they are just waiting until they perfect the programming. lol
